docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Federal Government and more than 20 health organizations today issued the nation's first detailed guidelines for identifying and treating people whose blood cholesterol levels are high enough to require medical treatment.

headline.main: U.S. Defines Cholesterol Hazards And Offers Treatment Guidelines

docs.snippet: LEAD: The Federal Government and more than 20 health organizations today issued the nation's first detailed guidelines for identifying and treating people whose blood cholesterol levels are high enough to require medical treatment.

byline.original: By PHILIP M. BOFFEY, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A New York State program to subsidize prescription-drug purchases for elderly people goes into effect today, but only a small percentage of those eligible have enrolled.

headline.main: Drug Subsidies for Elderly Starting in New York State

docs.snippet: LEAD: A New York State program to subsidize prescription-drug purchases for elderly people goes into effect today, but only a small percentage of those eligible have enrolled.
